data.message: Polıcy Fb-Safety   just received a message from this page pretending to be FB and notifying me of my timeline abuse...suspicious when they asked for my login name and password when I was already logged in.  I have reported their page.  When I go to their page it is obviously someone phishing for login info.

replies.message: Hey Vicki. Thanks for reporting this and helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Nancy

I also reported him.  I just got a reply that quotes his name as something other than "Policy FB-Safety".  So apparently he does a hit and run then changes the name on his page.  I'm sure you can see the history of his page.

I just went back to the message sent - it is in the area for those not friends - and sure enough, it now shows Joe Mxxxxxx.  I'm sure you can see the message. Be sure to check the link in it as it is to apps.facebook.com....what a scam and sleazy way to get people's login and password....shortly after that I received a friend request from some woman whose name I believe I saw on his page.
